page.title: 05CUMBERNAULD HOME LIFE
page.content: I LIVE IN A PART OF CUMBERNAULD CALLED ABRONHILL. I LIVE ON THE TOP OF A HILL.FROM MY HOUSE YOU CAN SEE THE CAMPSIE FELLS.MOST OF THE HOUSES HAVE MODERN DESIGNS. THE HOUSES ARE BIG, THERE IS A LIVING ROOM,A DINING ROOM, A KITCHEN, TWO TOILETS AND THREE BEDROOMS IN EVERY HOUSE.OUTSIDE THERE ARE SOME SHRUBS AND BUSHES WHICH MAKE THE PLACE EVEN NICER. NEAR OUR HOUSE THERE IS A SWING PARK.THERE ARE 6 BABY SWINGS AND SIX BIG SWINGS. THERE ARE TWO CLIMBING FRAMES, ONE IS SHAPED LIKE AN INDIAN TEEPEE. THE OTHER ONE IS SHAPED LIKE A SPIDER, IT HAS A BIG BODY WHICH YOU CAN SIT ON. THAT IS WHY WE NICK NAME THE PARK THE "SPIDER SWINGS". AT THE BACK OF MY HOUSE THERE IS A WOOD WHICH IS GOOD FOR BUILDING DENS. I HAVE A SHOPPING CENTRE NEAR MY HOUSE WHICH HAS 8 SHOPS IN IT.(NEW PAGE)
